summary.Title: Become a subcontractor distributing local newspapers and commercials
summary.JobHeadline: Become a subcontractor distributing local newspapers and commercials
summary.Presentation:
Dear Business Owner – do you want to make extra money for your business?

Do you have two or more employees, whom sometimes have some extra time on their hands?

WorkPlace.Name: FK Distribution
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription: FK Distribution formidler digitale tilbud, fysiske reklamer og ugeaviser til de danske forbrugere. Virksomheden har siden sin etablering i 1965 udviklet sig fra en klassisk distributionsvirksomhed til en avanceret virksomhed, der formidler tilbud på tværs af forskellige mediekanaler. FK står bl.a. bag NejTak+, minetilbud.dk samt minetilbud appen. FK Distribution A/S er et datterselskab til North Media A/S.

HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription: FK Distribution formidler digitale tilbud, fysiske reklamer og ugeaviser til de danske forbrugere. Virksomheden har siden sin etablering i 1965 udviklet sig fra en klassisk distributionsvirksomhed til en avanceret virksomhed, der formidler tilbud på tværs af forskellige mediekanaler. FK står bl.a. bag NejTak+, minetilbud.dk samt minetilbud appen. FK Distribution A/S er et datterselskab til North Media A/S.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Become a subcontractor distributing local newspapers and commercials
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Dear Business Owner – do you want to make extra money for your business?

  • Do you have two or more employees, whom sometimes have some extra time on their hands?
  • Would you like to exchange this “wasted” time for extra revenue for your business?

Then we have the perfect opportunity for you.

Become a subcontractor distributing local newspapers and commercials.
As a subcontractor you will be responsible for:

  • Picking up the newspapers and commercials at our terminal in Taastrup or a local depot.
  • Your employees distributing the newspapers and commercials in private mailboxes on specific routes.

Can you answer yes to these 4 questions? Then you are just what we are looking for!

  1. You have two or more employees with free hours during the week
  2. You are great with planning and meeting deadlines
  3. You are able to motivate your employees to do a quality job
  4. You have a van available

A contract with many benefits
Being a subcontractor is a very flexible job. Depending on how many hours/employees you have available, you will be offered a suitable number of routes. You will be able to schedule your own time and distribution - within our deadlines, of course.

Distribution is on Wednesday and Thursday in the hours between 8:00 and 21:00

If you are interested in learning more about the subcontractor opportunity, please call Malene Alstrøm on 2757 9373 or send an e-mail to: malene.alstrom@fk.dk

DriverLicense.Name: A10
DriverLicense.Description: Villig til at bruge egen bil i jobbet
